It performs well enough but the game speed can be a little on the slow side, maybe it's set that way on purpose to limit battery usage, which is reasonable. I haven't run into any bugs or crashes in the hours i've already played.    Great Job.  I hope Icewind Dale 2 is coming to Android some day.
